actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control, Cazenovia Creek, Buffalo metropolitan area, New York.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the flood control project at Cazenovia Creek, Buffalo, New York.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control, Cazenovia Creek, Buffalo metropolitan area, New York.
